description: Purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture.
full_summary:
**Tender Opportunity for Office Furniture**
==============================================

**Title:** EZ899-242134 Office Furniture - CFIA

**Reference Number:** WS4512447872-Doc4530890277

**Publication Date:** April 10, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** May 2, 2024, 2:00 PM ET

** brief Background:** The Real Property Branch of Public Services and Procurement Canada on behalf of Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking a supplier to provide office furniture for Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA).

**Scope of Work:** The successful supplier will be responsible for delivering and installing office furniture at the CFIA location (8801 East Saanich Rd., North Saanich, Sidney BC V8L 1H3) with a delivery and installation start date of July 1, 2024, and completed by July 12, 2024.

**Tender Details:**

*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** British Columbia
*   **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia
*   **Trade Agreements:** None
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Required Documents:** 

*   Request for Proposal (RFP) system invitation through the http://discovery.ariba.com platform.
 
**Solicitation Number:** WS4512447872

**Attachments:** None

You may contact:

*   Mikulova, Kristina  
      PSPC
.   
 email her at kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Needful Note:** Suppliers are required to be registered on the Shopping.merx part or a SA holder to submit a bid to this tender.  

You are kindly requested to encourage clerks to visit the links below for thorough details of the terms and conditions of this current CFIA government tenders.

[Link to terms & conditions](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19365039?extsite=MTkzNjUwMzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

[Link to SIlist Carrrige Bills date](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19365039?extsite=MTkzNjUwMzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Thank you in advance
